question: In Goblet of Fire, who is revealed to be the true identity of Mad-Eye Moody?

Which of the following Hogwarts houses values traits such as bravery, courage, chivalry, and daring?

In Half-Blood Prince, what is the significance of the locket that Dumbledore and Harry retrieve from the cave?
What is the name of the mysterious and magical object that becomes the central focus of the trio's quest to defeat Voldemort?

choice1: It shows the future, revealing the destiny of the person
choice2: It reflects the deepest desires of the heart
choice3: It reveals hidden truths about the person's past
choice4: It shows a distorted version of reality

question: What is the prophecy concerning Harry and Voldemort that is revealed in the Department of Mysteries?
choice1: Neither can live while the other survives
choice2: They are destined to be eternal enemies
choice4: Harry is the true heir of Slytherin

question: What is the Unforgivable Curse that causes intense pain to the victim without causing any physical harm?
What is the name of the magical object that Dumbledore uses to retrieve and view memories?
In Order of the Phoenix, what is the prophecy that is revealed in the Hall of Prophecy at the Department of Mysteries?
choice1: The one with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches...
choice2: The chosen one will defeat Voldemort using the Elder Wand...
choice3: The Ministry of Magic will fall unless Voldemort is defeated...
choice4: The true heir of Slytherin will rise to power...

question: The real identity of the Half-Blood Prince?

choice3: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good

question: What is the name of the village near Hogwarts where students often visit to buy supplies and enjoy some leisure time?
'Take a bath, and - er - take the egg with you, and - er - just mull things over in the hot water. It'll help you think... trust me.'
'Silly girl ... But Madam Pomfrey fixed her nose back on in the end.'
'Oh, please... I don't think Expelliarmus is exactly going to help us against You-Know-Who, do you?'
'My dad's Muggle-born and he's a right old slob. I suppose it varies, just as it does with wizards?'
'So - is it really true? You make a stag Patronus?'
'My philosophy is that worrying means you suffer twice.'
Mrs Weasley gave Ron the same colour jumper every year, what was it?
Who did Hermione knit lots of hats for?
choice3: The new first-years when she was a Prefect

question: Lucius Malfoy: 'Dear me, what's the use of being ______ the name of wizard if they don't even pay you well for it?'

'Well, this Hallowe'en will be my five hundredth deathday'
'But Winky didn't know that I was growing stronger. I was starting to fight my father's ______ '
Bellatrix Lestrange: ' ______ ?... Why, I have had the pleasure of meeting your parents, boy.'

choice1: Hermione set Snape's robes on fire
choice2: Hagrid went to get Madam Hooch

question: During Harry's first Quidditch match in his third year, what happened to cause Harry to fall from his broom?
choice2: A rogue Bludger to the head
choice4: The heavy rain made Harry slip

question: After Draco Malfoy was revealed as the new Quidditch Seeker for the Slytherin team, what did Draco reveal his father had bought the whole squad?
choice1: Brand new Nimbus Two Thousand and Ones

question: What was the name of Argus Filch's cat?
What is the next line of the cruel Slytherin song, Weasley is Our King?
choice1: 'Are his arms broken in a sling?'

choice1: She was wearing a t-shirt with Ron's face on it
choice2: She had painted a Gryffindor banner
choice3: She was wearing a fully-roaring lion hat
choice4: She was dressed in Gryffindor robes

question: What happened after Harry got off the Hogwarts Express at Hogsmeade in Philosopher's Stone?
choice1: He flew a broomstick from Hogsmeade station to Hogwarts
choice2: He and the other first-years followed McGonagall on a walk to the castle
choice3: He followed Hagrid to the boats that were to take the first-years across the lake to Hogwarts
choice4: He got into a carriage that appeared to be pulled by invisible horses

question: What did the Room of Requirement turn into for Argus Filch?
choice1: A place to lock up unruly students

choice3: A place to hide from Peeves

question: Argus Filch held what role at Hogwarts?

choice1: She immediately ran to the kitchen to see it for herself
choice2: She broke down in tears of disbelief

choice1: He excitedly exclaimed 'Look the Sorting Hat!'

choice1: They climbed out of the car and bumped straight into Dumbledore
choice2: The car ejected them both with Hedwig and their luggage then drove off

Peter Pettigrew: 'Kind boy ... kind master ... you won't let them do it ... I was your ______ I was a good pet

Antonin Dolohov: 'That headcase ______ kept a whole bunch of stuff in here,'
Amycus Carrow: 'She ain't answering, you ______ ! You open it! Garn! Do it, now!'

question: Who did Harry meet when he took a bath in the Prefects' bathroom?

question: After Fred, George and Ron rescued Harry from Privet Drive in Chamber of Secrets, what happened when they landed the flying Ford Anglia back at The Burrow?
choice1: Mr Weasley greeted them and asked if the car had flown well
choice2: Percy saw them outside and went to tell on them to Mrs Weasley
choice3: Mrs Weasley came outside and was furious with them (except Harry)
choice4: Ginny met them outside and helped them to sneak into the house

question: What happened after Uncle Vernon said 'No post on Sundays' in Philosopher's Stone?
choice1: The milkman delivered twenty-seven Hogwarts letters along with three pints of semi-skimmed milk
choice2: Thirty or forty Hogwarts letters came whizzing down the chimney and shot out of the fireplace
choice3: Sixteen Hogwarts letters were dropped through the window of the downstairs loo
choice4: Ten owls carrying ten Hogwarts letters came through the kitchen window

question: What happened when Fred dropped a bag of sweets in the Dursleys' living room in Goblet of Fire?
choice1: Dudley ate a Ton-Tongue Toffee and his tongue grew to be at least a foot long
choice2: Uncle Vernon ate one and it turned out to be a Nosebleed Nougat
choice3: Aunt Petunia shouted at him for making a mess on her carpet
choice4: Fred collected all the sweets before leaving

question: In Prisoner of Azkaban, what happened when Harry tripped over after seeing a pair of glowing eyes in Magnolia Crescent?
choice1: His wand flew out of his hand as he flung out his arm to break his fall and the Knight Bus appeared
choice2: He landed in a heap on the road with a broken arm and broken pair of glasses
choice3: Sirius Black stepped out of the shadows to reveal himself
choice4: Members of the Ministry of Magic found him (at the request of Cornelius Fudge) to fly him to Diagon Alley

question: When the Dark Mark was cast in the forest clearing after the Quidditch World Cup right by Harry, Ron and Hermione - what happened next?
choice1: Mr Weasley grabbed them and used an emergency Portkey to get them back to Stoatshead Hill
choice2: Before they could go anywhere they were grabbed by Ministry officials
choice3: They ran as fast as they could back to the tents at the campsite to find Mr Weasley
choice4: They were surrounded by roughly twenty wizards and narrowly avoided Stunning Spells

question: When staying at The Burrow before their sixth year, what happened to Hermione when she picked up and squeezed a telescope from a box of Fred and George's possessions?
choice1: It grew to one hundred times its size so they had to leave the room
choice2: Hermione looked through it and it showed her a map of all the stars in the sky
choice3: It punched her with a tiny fist hidden inside and gave her a black eye
choice4: It made an incredibly loud noise and shot sparks from the end of it

question: During Order of the Phoenix, what happened when a Dementor got hold of Dudley's wrists and lowered its head to kiss him?
choice1: Dudley was subjected to the Dementor's Kiss
choice2: Harry commanded the Patronus he had already conjured to charge the Dementor
choice3: Members of the Order of the Phoenix arrived and cast multiple Patronuses at the Dementors
choice4: Mrs Figg arrived and screamed at Harry to cast a Patronus

question: At Bill and Fleur's wedding, what happened immediately after the tufty-haired wizard pronounced them 'bonded for life' and showered the couple with silver stars?
choice1: The golden balloons overhead burst and tiny birds of paradise and golden bells flew out

choice4: Fred and George released a load of fireworks from their shop

question: On Harry's seventeenth birthday, what happened when Ginny kissed Harry in her room?
choice1: Ron burst through the door and interrupted them
choice2: Mrs Weasley interrupted them and told them to help with Bill and Fleur's wedding preparations
choice3: Ginny told Harry she loved him
choice4: Harry told Ginny that it could never happen again

question: When is Harry Potter's birthday?

question: On Harry's first birthday, who joined the Potters for his birthday tea?

question: Who did the watch that Molly Weasley gifted Harry when he came of age originally belong to?

question: Which of Harry's friends was born the day before him?

choice1: A photo album with pictures of his mum and dad at school
